text: Sailing has been a sport of the Pan American Games since the inaugural 1951 Pan American Games, being contested in every edition, except for the 1955 edition.Sports123 (archived)Guadalajara 2011 bgcolor=D3D3D3|361 |} ;Notes At the 1959 edition, Barton Kirkconell from JamaicaSports-reference.com and Rawle Barrow from Trinidad and TobagoSport Archives T&T; earned, together, a bronze medal at the Flyting Dutchman class. The medal is credited to the West Indies Federation. ==References== Category:Sports at the Pan American Games Pan American Games
